name: Football Odds
author: Patrick_Al

sections.description:
This free plugin will enable the creation on your blog for pages with complete football odds comparison system, easy to use or install.
The plugin enables high customization of pages for specific games, leagues, countries, odds or bookmakers.

The Free Football Odds plugin main features:

  • compatible with almost any WordPress theme – tested on over 300+ themes;
  • compatible with the last version of WordPress and future releases;
  • easy to install and integrate into you blog post or pages with shortcodes;
  • highly responsive design – you can integrate on mobile themes or mobile websites;
  • you can choose the odds comparison from over 10 popular bookmakers: Bet365, etc..;
  • high customization of the tables with your own text, color or language;
  • real time clicked link reports with a total transparency of the plugin affiliate tracking management system;
  • useful filters to display in your page only the data you need;
  • free support by email, we answer in maximum 2 working days.
sections.installation:
1. Upload Football Odds plugin to your blog, on to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Email us for enable your site access to our database.
sections.faq:
1. How activate this plugin?

* Be sure that you complete on Football Odds settings a valid address and email and save configuration.
* Send an email to office@oddslords.com where you must specify the site IP address, site URL and a valid contact email.
* You will get in a short time an email from us (12-24 hours or even faster sometimes).

Installation Instructions

  1. Upload Football Odds plugin to your blog, on to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Email us for enable your site access to our database.
sections.changelog:
1.9

  1. Fixed new competitions with their flags.
  2. Fixed some unecesary codes.

1.8

  1. Fixed new competitions with their flags.
  2. Shorcoder minor changes.
  3. Added info on Euro2016 and Coppa America

1.7

  1. More visual improvements
  2. Fixed tracking report for non-dedicated IP’s sites.
  3. Fixed compatiblility with last WordPress release 4.5
  4. Minor changes on shortcoder.
